attributes.title: ⚠️APP SENDS A VIRUS TO YOUR PHONE⚠️
attributes.review: By downloading the app a virus is sent to your phone causing it to randomly crash. This virus was installed so that Trump and his cabinet could access your personal information! What ever you to do not get this app! It is bugged!!!

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: I went to open the app and it crashed several times and kept loading to an orange screen. Do not recommend!!✨

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever seen...
attributes.review: This app said it could give me directions to the nearest Applebee’s... when I arrived at the destination it was a convention center for dogs, I think they did this deliberately because I’m allergic to dogs...

attributes.title: Racist
attributes.review: I would give it 0 stars if i could . This app killed my parents and made my dog sick, then my cat ran away and my house burnt down. Typing this from under a bridge cause i am now homeless.

attributes.title: Worst app every
attributes.review: This app is the worst app that was ever created I was just tryna support trump where I downloaded it and my whole phone crashed and now I don’t have any contacts or nothing this app ruined my phone so WORST APP EVERRRRR!!!!

attributes.title: WARNING DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is a complete motherhuncher. This app took a straight 6 weeks to download only for me to receive horrible service. Along with that I was shipped expired oranges that gave a horrible stench. This app is complete cursed. Do not download it.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app took so long to download it messed up my in tire phone I had to get a new one so glitchy and my internet is the best but for some reason it was messing up do not download this app I beg you

attributes.title: Horrible devil
attributes.review: My little sister had downloaded this app on my phone I opened the app then out our nowhere the scary orange trump started singing the “tip toe by the window” song repeatedly (x25) which made a cult of rats surround me!😾

attributes.title: One Star.
attributes.review: This app took days, almost weeks to download. For a app that takes that long should not be that was hard to maneuver and the service was very rude. 1 star for me.
